{{Description|In Liyue Harbor, an adventurer is busy with a certain task...}}
'''Behind the Scenes''' is a subevent during [[The Exquisite Night Chimes]].

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1  = Tutorial Behind the Scenes 1.png
|text1   = When an opponent is defeated, a shockwave will be released at the position where they have fallen, dealing Pyro DMG to nearby opponents. Use this ability well to assist you in achieving victory more easily.
|image2  = Tutorial Behind the Scenes 2.png
|text2   = After you have defeated all opponents in an area and opened the treasure chest, a wind current will appear in the area that can be used to quickly travel to the next opposing position.
}}

==Stages==
===Gameplay Notes===
* Complete ''[[Behind the Scenes (Event Quest)|Behind the Scenes]]'' to unlock this event segment.
* Each area's treasure chest contains {{Item|Mora|x=30,000}}, {{Item|Hero's Wit|x=3}}, and {{Item|Mystic Enhancement Ore|x=3}}.
* The prerequisite challenges must be completed to unlock the next area.
